resources.string: Welcome to Appsolute Chaos! This is a challenging Android XR game where you must read instructions and click the correct button while the window moves around you every 3 seconds. Stay focused, read carefully, and click the right button to advance to the next level. Wrong clicks will reset you back to level 1!

The window will randomly move around you every 3 seconds. Each time it moves, the buttons change their text, color, size, and position. Find and click the button specified in the instructions to advance. Good luck!
